Key Match Events: Bo Naylor hit a leadoff home run in the 7th inning
The Guardians scored four runs in the 7th inning
Emmanuel Clase recorded his American League-best 39th save
Post-Match Reflections: Stephen Vogt acknowledged the importance of the win for the team's overall morale
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Guardians avoided being swept by Kansas City in four games for the first time since June 1973
The Guardians once again have a one-game lead over Kansas City in the AL Central
Others: Andrés Giménez made a game-saving play in the 8th inning
Tanner Bibee acknowledged the team's struggles but expressed confidence in their ability to turn things around
